MVP.title: Total project completion at this point
MVP.description: My Minimum Viable Product is a computer monitor connected through HDMI to a raspberry pi. this monitor will display things on the mirror such as date and time, weather statistics, and a progress bar to track the VHHS period schedule. Spotify functionality is implemented, however there is no way to play the music yet. We have also attached a camera to the raspberry pi and got the video signal into the computer, allowing later implementation of facial regonition
